rules_text:
When Mafusho Rites enters the battlefield, add two 0/0 black Shade creature tokens with “This creature gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard” to your bestiary. [i](If you would create a creature token, you may instead put one into play from your bestiary.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may mill two cards.
